title: The New Samsung SSD is Priced at $0.07/GB With This Amazon Post-Prime Day Deal
description: The Samsung T9 model is probably the best SSD available on the market today.
author: Gizmodo Deals
excerpt: The Samsung T9 model is probably the best SSD available on the market today.
text: Amazon continues to offer an unbeatable deal on the Samsung T9 4TB SSD and extends the exceptional Prime Day pricing to all shoppers, not just Prime members. This high-performance storage device originally priced at $549 is available for just $299 which is a substantial 45% discount. See at Amazon Speed up to 2,000MB/s Samsung has long been recognized as a leader in SSD technology and the latest T9 model exemplifies why it’s considered the best in the industry. This cutting-edge SSD is engineered to meet the diverse needs of content creators, gaming enthusiasts, academics and professionals. Its standout feature is the blazing-fast data transfer capability and boasts sequential read and write speeds that can reach an impressive 2,000MB/s. The T9’s design philosophy centers on flexibility and broad compatibility. It works seamlessly with a wide array of devices from traditional desktops and laptops to specialized equipment like professional-grade cameras and modern gaming consoles. This versatility is particularly beneficial for professionals who frequently transition between different work environments or need to transfer large datasets across various platforms effortlessly. To complement the hardware, Samsung has included its proprietary Magician Software with the T9. This suite of tools is designed to help users maximize the drive’s potential and offers features such as performance optimization, regular firmware updates, enhanced security options and ongoing health monitoring. This ensures the T9 maintains peak performance and reliability throughout its operational lifespan. The timing of this deal is particularly advantageous. While it originated during Prime Day, Amazon has extended this offer to all customers making it accessible to a broader audience during this weekend. This level of discount on a premium Samsung SSD is rare, and it’s unlikely that we’ll see a better price even during upcoming sales events like Black Friday. Keep in mind that while the deal has been extended for a few more days, it’s still subject to stock availability. Given the popularity of Samsung SSDs and the significant discount being offered, there’s a real possibility that stock could run out quickly. See at Amazon
